src package¶

Submodules¶

src.Pdf_table_extr module¶

This is a python script for extraction of Meta_Analysis table data and developed for this specific purpose. In order to run this script please follow the steps in README.md file

return

Publication info and extracted table data

rtype

datasets

class src.Pdf_table_extr.PubData(doi)[source]¶

Bases: object

This class stores publication data extracted from crossref call

Parameters

  • title (str, defaults to none) – title of the publication

  • authors (str, defaults to none) – list of authors

  • jur (str) – Name of the journal

  • pub_year (int) – Published year, defaults to 0

  • doi – doi of the publication

Type

str

authors = ''¶
jur = ''¶
pub_year = 0¶
status = True¶

src.drive_functions module¶

This is the google drive api module and contatins functions to interact to google drive

src.drive_functions.Create_Service(client_secret_file, api_name, api_version, *scopes)[source]¶

Create a service connection to google drive

Parameters

  • client_secret_file (json) – Client secret file generated from google api

  • api_name (str) – The api name for this aplication(drive)

  • api_version (str) – version of the api(we are using version 3)

Returns

service

Return type

api service

src.drive_functions.get_files(service)[source]¶

A function to read files metadata from a folder (PDEA) in google drive to extract the tables

Parameters

service (service) – google drive serviece

src.drive_functions.get_temp_pdf(service, file_id)[source]¶

This function downloads a file from google drive to a local machine using its file ID

Parameters

  • service (service) – Google drive service

  • file_id (str) – google drive file id
